scripts.db:up: cd docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.infra.yml up -d db
scripts.db:down: cd docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.infra.yml down
scripts.db:del: pnpm db:down && docker volume rm researchcruiseapp_researchcruiseapp-db
scripts.getAdminPass: pnpm db:up && sleep 5 && cd backend && tempfile=$(mktemp) && (timeout 20 dotnet run --project ResearchCruiseApp.csproj | tee -a $tempfile) && pnpm db:down && cat $tempfile | grep admin && rm $tempfile
